    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect to the Server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - could be BadAuthentication or BadUrl

      • setExceptionListener

        void setExceptionListener(TGConnectionExceptionListener lsnr)
        Set Exception Listener
        Parameters:
        lsnr - - an instance of exception listener

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Disconnect from the Server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if it cannot terminate and flush the sockets. One can safely ignore the exception

      • get

        TGConnection get()
          throws TGException
        Get a free Connection
        Returns:
        a free Connection object
        Throws:
        TGConnectionTimeoutException - is thrown when there is no connection in the pool and the time specified has elapsed. The property ConnectionReserveTimeoutSeconds or tgdb.connectionpool.ConnectionReserveTimeoutSeconds specifies the time to wait in seconds. It has the following meaning 0 : Indefinite -1 : Immediate > : That many seconds
        TGException

      • release

        void release(TGConnection conn)
        Release the connection back to the pool
        Parameters:
        conn - a TGConnection

      • getPoolSize

        int getPoolSize()
        Get the pool size
        Returns:
        the pool size
